pageContent: Purpose: We evaluated the effect of three-dimensional conformal radiation therapy (3D-CRT) with or without hormonal therapy (HT) on sexual function (SF) in prostate cancer patients whose SF was known before all treatment.

metaData.source:
Health-related quality of life after robot-assisted radical prostatectomy compared with laparoscopic radical prostatectomy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28130703/
